titleStmt.title: The co[n]futacyon of the fyrst parte of Frythes boke with a dysputacyon before whether it be possyble for any heretike to know that hym selfe is one or not. And also an other, whether it be wors to denye directely more or lesse of the fayth, put forth by Iohn Gwynneth clerke.
titleStmt.author: Gwynneth, John.

titleStmt.title: The co[n]futacyon of the fyrst parte of Frythes boke with a dysputacyon before whether it be possyble for any heretike to know that hym selfe is one or not. And also an other, whether it be wors to denye directely more or lesse of the fayth, put forth by Iohn Gwynneth clerke.
titleStmt.author: Gwynneth, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Herford for R. Stevenage],

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Frith, John. A boke made by John Frith prisoner in the tower of London.
Place of publication and printers' names from STC.
At end, "Here endeth the fyrste book"; no more published.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
